definition: variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在国会里，强森大力支持美国向西部扩张的计画。

sentences.english: The students collected a bag of bark for their science project.
sentences.chinese: 学生为进行科学计画搜集了一袋树皮。

sentences.english: A study plan written in Chinese.
Some of those launches are expected to take place as early as this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 这是预定好的计画只是提早到这星期实行。

sentences.english: I' try not to exceed my planned budget for this holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我试著不要计画我的旅行会超出预算。

sentences.english: They ventured on an ambitious program of reform.
sentences.chinese: 他们冒然采取一项野心勃勃的改革计画。

sentences.english: Promoting literacy is one of Laura Bush's main projects as first lady.
sentences.chinese: 推广读写能力是萝拉身为第一夫人的主要计画。

sentences.english: Our holiday plans have gone phut.
sentences.chinese: 我们的假日计画已经吹了。

sentences.english: It is the time to refresh and make good plans.
sentences.chinese: 这是令人精神一振以及可以开始好好计画的时刻。

sentences.english: Bernie and his friends plan to do a road trip around the island after their graduation.
sentences.chinese: 柏尼和他的朋友计画毕业后环岛旅行。

sentences.english: But Pitt pursues nonphilanthropic projects, too.
sentences.chinese: 小布也不忘追求非慈善事业计画。

sentences.english: Expenditure on preparation of the overall development plan of the new town.
sentences.chinese: 新市镇整体开发计画规划费用。

sentences.english: VII. The award scheme is covered by the NCKU English Eagle Project.
sentences.chinese: 本奖励经费由顶尖大学成英计画经费项下支付。

sentences.english: This project will go down to the wire.
sentences.chinese: 这个计画将到最后的阶段。

sentences.english: Review construction plans, and sign or seal after approval.
sentences.chinese: 一查核施工计画书，并于认可后签名或盖章。

definition: variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
variant of 巨額|巨额[ju4 e2]
